data.text: @DonaldinaE Hi Donaldina. You'll have to tell us why you love them if you want to win!
@FriesenJoseph Thanks for flying with us, Joseph! Hope you enjoyed your flight!

data.text: @ChulChuChul Please refer to the following link for free baggage info: http://t.co/PzzRsLnVeB You may contact 800-227-4262 for more info.
@hchan1981 We're announcing the winner on Friday!
@bainelaker @thursdaeschild Thanks for the compliments! :) Glad you enjoyed your flight with us. Hope to see you again soon!
@LHRlocal @HeathrowAirport Wow! Thanks for sharing this photo. Looks beautiful!
RT @staralliance: Now on an A380 to #NYC with @AsianaAirlines. Win tickets on this new #ASIANA380! http://t.co/Ksdez4l0h2 #StarAlliance htt…
@lanisha2498 We're still accepting tweets! Winner will be announced on Friday.
@KathyMei_ We're announcing the winner on Friday. Keep following for results!
@chenhyun0920 Still accepting tweets. :)
@joyousjessicax3 Just tweet us and let us know why you love BTS. We're choosing winners on Friday.
@SvartMjolk Glad it has been resolved! Thanks for your patience!
@XoxoMerlin Hello, you may still enter until we announce winners. Just tweet us and tell us why you love them so much!
@cocotweetsLA Hello! You may check out our Lost & Found here: http://t.co/wsCBtlCA8a
Haven't seen our new video yet? Watch here and see how travel writer Matt Kepnes experiences Asia: https://t.co/eL1Xgjrahg
For those who tweeted us to win tickets to the #BTS concert in NYC, we'll be announcing winners on Friday! Thanks for the entries! #BTSArmy
@eggrollohr Thanks so much for the kind compliments. We appreciate it and hope to see your mother on board again soon! (And you, too!)
@AirlineFlyer Wow, amazing! Thanks for sharing the photo from LAX, Jason!
Why do you fly with Asiana Airlines? Check out our new TV Commercial to see why travel bloggers enjoy flying OZ: https://t.co/eL1Xgjrahg
Want to win a ride on the new #ASIANA380 from JFK? Enter in our sweepstakes now: http://t.co/hEK2LtxrDI #getlucky http://t.co/27RtDqUAxS
@SvartMjolk Hello, please DM your e-mail address with the dates & itinerary so that we may look into this further to assist you.
@daniel_newlands We're happy to bring even the slightest joy to our loyal customers. Hope to see you again soon!
@escobar_cesar Hello Cesar, We never received a DM with your inquiry. Please send us details so that we can look into this matter further.
#ASIANA380 is finally here in New York City. #JFK #Airbus #A380 http://t.co/0IMA5dBgYp
@escobar_cesar ..and we'll investigate further. Thank you!
@escobar_cesar Hello Cesar, we apologize for the unacceptable service you experienced. Please feel free to DM us the situation...
@GymyG Thanks! Hope to see you on board soon!
Enter in our sweepstakes for your chance to fly on the new #ASIANA380 from New York to Seoul, Korea! http://t.co/hEK2LtP32i
ONE MORE DAY. #ASIANA380 in New York! #Airbus #A380 http://t.co/8AKN6GrDB4
@velsx3 No, the prize is a pair of concert tickets and meet & greets.
Only 2 more days until the new #ASIANA380 touches down in #NewYorkCity! Are you ready for a brand new aircraft, #JFK? http://t.co/vMa6OrJcmm
@eike92 Hopefully you'll get a photo of it soon! :)
We love this! Thanks for sharing.  https://t.co/yW4MF8ggKQ
@blackiepoppins Yes, you may still tweet us! :)
@NuttyFlyer Hello Nick, yes, please DM us with your information and we will assist you the best we can.
@borin_park You can still tweet us! :)
Thanks for all your tweets #BTSArmy! Follow us and watch out for our winner announcement -- sometime in two weeks!
#BTSARMY of New York, tell us how much you love #BTS & we'll get you into the NY show with a friend & MEET the boys! http://t.co/aCPrCUquRm
HEY #BTS fans! We're giving one super fan a chance to meet BTS during the New York concert on July 16th! #방탄소년단 http://t.co/eSoLsppx3N
On Monday, we celebrated our 20th Anniversary for the SEA-ICN route and were welcomed with this water cannon salute! http://t.co/0ptXL18u04
We haven't done this in a while, but we may have a surprise for #KPOP fans in #NewYork. Follow us & look out for an event soon! #ASIANA380
@wonjinkyu Hello John, apologies for the inconvenience. Please send your inquiry to customerus@flyasiana.com with your full info.
@saigonnezumi Please submit your personal info w/ AC account number and e-ticket itinerary to usasianaclub@flyasiana.com for further info.
@saigonnezumi If you signed up within a month from your trip, you may be eligible for mileage claim.
Our SEA-ICN route via OZ271/272 is officially 20 years old! :) Thank you @SeaTacAirport! https://t.co/0CW4fqLIlF
@healthcora Thank you, Corinne! We're glad to hear you had a pleasant flight. Hope to see you on board again soon!
Good morning, Tweeps! Happy Monday. Share with us photos of your trip with Asiana! https://t.co/DfiOVdTbvb
@saigonnezumi Wow, thank you for snapping photos of our aircraft! We appreciate you flying with us! :)
RT @kaatxxi: And wow I love Asiana airlines 😝 got to taste authentic Korean food! My favorite is Korean Beef 😋 http://t.co/aJfhw9q9ax

✈ #Repost @superwilfee
・・・
ASIANA380: Special Edition https://t.co/t4PlNYVtea
@DaveSimons Hello Dave, please DM us your reservation number and we'll assist you.
Only a few hours left of today's #DreamFareTuesday! Click to view sweet deals to Asia http://t.co/IN2uahhZcm http://t.co/4aW25PdmQv
@PatrickIcasas If it's not listed in Lost & Found, please send detailed information through our VOC: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ Thank you!
@PatrickIcasas Have you checked our Lost and Found page? http://t.co/wsCBtlCA8a
@florencegin Yes our website is down. We're currently looking into the issue to get it fixed ASAP. Apologies for the inconvenience.
@ermap Hello, sorry for the inconvenience. Would you mind sending us a DM about where you're having trouble? We'll be sure to investigate.
@orgler Hi Johannes, please DM us details with your contact information. We'll forward it to our Asiana Club Team. Thank you!
Participate now for your chance to win a free flight to Asia! #ASIANA380 #Travel #NYC http://t.co/hEK2LtxrDI http://t.co/LP3NM5eSTg
What a beautiful view you have there! :) Thanks for sharing. https://t.co/haCv6aRN5A
@DimitriVangelis Hi Dimitri -- can you DM us the problem you're having on our website? We'll take it up to our team for further assistance.
We love our B747! Thanks for sharing! https://t.co/q4gqyb6ZBN
@JoshhLam Thanks! We hope to see you on board again soon! :)
@kvmusic Hello Kyle -- which airport are you referring to? We'll look into the issue...
@saigonnezumi Hope you enjoy your flight with us! :)
Today may be #CincoDeMayo, but in S. Korea, children are appreciated and honored in celebration of #ChildrensDay! http://t.co/6xdAx85UFN
Flying with Asiana Airlines in the month of May? Don't forget to support #Nepal by donating your change. http://t.co/HXLDxhiEmD
RT @allkpop: Enter the Asiana Airlines 'Fly me to NYC ASIANA380' Sweepstakes http://t.co/vfAMZxGAD8 http://t.co/LhJj3xhiuj
Join Asiana with #UNICEF to support Nepal. Donate your change on board our flights to the #ChangeForGood campaign. http://t.co/x14buX7zCd
Your chance to win a round-trip ticket on the new #ASIANA380 from #NYC to #Korea is here! http://t.co/hEK2LtxrDI http://t.co/WWYXEemcGp
@ryanpdp Sorry, we do not have routes to New Zealand nor a sales office. Thank you!
@ryanpdp Hello Ryan! Please contact our reservation center at 800-227-4262 to inquire STPC eligibility with your reservation. Thank you!
Get your smartphones ready! Internet/mobile boarding pass service is coming your way at ICN and SFO starting May 1st. http://t.co/9Bp06rjbkt
@DivaDaDoc Hello, please DM us your reservation number and/or e-ticket number and we will assist you the best we can. Thank you!
@ldrstudentnurse Hello.  Unfortunately, we do not offer WiFi on board as of yet. Thank you!
@KasvanZonneveld Such a beautiful capture! Thanks for sharing this.
Have you entered into our #Seattle20thAnniversary Sweepstakes? Here's your chance to win: http://t.co/yQ1EahXFFa http://t.co/B5IP1np1IL
@LHS0418 안녕하세요, 한솔님. BOA카드 신청하실때 아시아나 회원번호 입력하셨을경우 자동으로 적립됩니다. 문의 사항 있으시면 미주지역 아시아나클럽으로 연락 주시기 바랍니다. (1-800-227-4262)
@pdsurgery Thanks for the kind compliments! Hope to see you on board again soon!
Happy Earth Day! #EarthDay #mothernature http://t.co/lFygXQFTQJ
@TheSnell Thanks, Chris. Please let us know if you need any assistance from us.
@samwongg Thanks so much for the support! We truly appreciate it. Hope you have a great weekend!
@itsskristine Kristine, we've received your DM, but are unable to respond without a follow back. Would you mind DMing us your email address.
@SunshineJB ...please DM us your e-mail address so that the appropriate department could follow up with your inquiry.
@SunshineJB Hi Joella. We are unable to respond to your DM without you following us. If you would like further assistance...
@itsskristine Hello Kristine, we apologize for any inconvenience. Please DM us and let us know how we might be able to help.
An incident at HIJ airport runway (Asiana OZ162) has occured. Please visit our Facebook page for up-to-date news: http://t.co/vfvQkCC3x3
@kidtraveler Thanks for the kind compliments! We're glad your kids enjoyed our flight. Hope to see you again soon!
@SunshineJB We'll be sure to get you proper assistance ASAP. Thank you!
@SunshineJB Hi Joella. We apologize for the inconvenience. Would you mind sending us a DM with your flight details, full name, and e-mail?
@c_lagorce Hello Christophe. The website seems to be working on our end... Please let us know how we can help. Thanks!
Did you enter our SEA 20th Anniversary Sweepstakes yet? Here's your chance to fly with us: http://t.co/yQ1EahG4NC http://t.co/XNqIpAryLF
@yunryan So beautiful! Thanks for capturing this wonderful #pano of our hangar! :)
We've got a new service route from ICN-FCO (Rome, Italy) starting June 30th! Click for info: http://t.co/UGiFl1z2iz http://t.co/MsO02UY90Z
@Oliahsu Yes, we fly out TPE-ICN via OZ711/712.
OZ271 (SEA-ICN) is celebrating its 20th anniversary on May 18th. Enter our sweepstakes now! http://t.co/yQ1EahXFFa http://t.co/tPv9gWDgBT

@ittybittykat Hello, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us your info and our CR Team will assist you further: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ
@tylerkiwii Hello! Can you please DM us with the page you are trying to access? We'll have a look into it. Thank you!
